title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a project, the confirmation message for scrubbing the bin directory is not displayed.
EB: When creating a project, a confirmation message should be displayed to confirm that the bin directory can be scrubbed successfully.
SR:
1. Launch the application. 
2. Go to the project creation page. 
3. Fill in the required fields and click on the 'Create' button. 
4. Verify that a confirmation message is displayed to confirm the scrubbing of the bin directory.
